Summary: I was at the park with my dad , we were standing at the open door of our car , and I looked up and saw this object traveling in the sky.
trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around August 25th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at the park with my dad , we were standing at the open door of our car , and I looked up and saw this object traveling in the sky. The object kept traveling and went to far to see. My feelings were excitment and curiousity . I first thought it was a baloon . Me and my dad were just talking next to our car , he was sitting in the passenger seat and I was standing next to the car with the passenger door open . The actions of the object were it was just traveling like about 20-30 miles an hour . I told my dad to look , and he got out of the car and he could not see it because his eyesight is so bad .
